name: storyteller
description: Storyteller is a self-hosted collaborative storytelling app where users write, branch, and share narratives in a structured web environment.
features: Collaborative writing: Creates stories with multiple contributors.
Branching narratives: Allows story to branch into different paths.
Chapter organization: Structures stories into chapters and sections.
Version control: Tracks changes and maintains story history.
Character database: Manages character profiles and relationships.
Plot tracking: Organizes plot points and story arcs.
Comment system: Discusses story elements with collaborators.
Access control: Controls who can read, edit, or contribute to stories.
Export options: Downloads stories as PDF, EPUB, or plain text.
Timeline view: Visualizes story chronology and events.
Writing prompts: Generates ideas to overcome writer's block.
Mobile friendly: Writes and edits from smartphones and tablets.
